props.description: Select v-model. If items are objects model returns `value` property (or `array` of `values` if select is `multi-value`) instead of whole object
Automatically calculates best placement for floating element
Allows filtering select items based on inputs value. You can also use v-autocomplete which is wrapper of v-select with this prop enabled by default
Base name used to style component
Attributes of v-card component used as container for select menu
Attributes of v-chevron component
Adds 'X' button that resets model to default value
Message to display inside menu when `items` array is empty
By default text property is used to filter items. You can set different properties by adding them to this prop.
Allows fliping dropdown to opposite placement if outside of current view
Attributes of v-input component
Set name of the property of items’s text value
Set name of the property of items’s value

Items to display. Can be `array` of `strings` or `objects` or mixed. Objects should at least have `text` and `value` properties. If `objects` have additional properties you can display them using `item` slot
Amounts of items to display per page, 0 = all items on single page. Ignored if `no-pagination` is used
Maximum number of rendered items for `multiple` select. If there is more items `max-multiple` slot can be used to show additional information
Allows selecting multiple values
Name of the component
Do not use internal filter in `autocomplete` mode. You should provide filtered items by updating `items` prop
Do no use internal pagination. You can paginate items by updating `items` prop
Offset of dropdown relative to reference element. See how to use this offset here
Offset of dropdown relative to reference element. See how to use this offset here
Initial placement of dropdown content. See valid values in Popperjs documentation
Menu item element

Sets animation effect when showing or hiding autocomplete menu. Valid values are: 'fade' or `empty string` to disable animations. Animation speed can be set in `--autocomplete-transition-duration` css variable.
Enables spinner in the input
Active variant of the elements style

events.description: Fired when next page is displayed (scroll reach end of dropdown menu)

slots.description: Content of this slot is appended to selected items if `max-multiple` prop is enabled
Slot for menu item. Slot props: `text`, `value`, `item`, `inputValue`
